desc: Co-lead a project which involved the whole software development lifecycle, from the design with a project specification to the implementation, testing and documentation.
Use of the Golang programming language for a command-line based messenging client.
Use of Azure Devops CI/CD and various testing frameworks e.g. Robot Integration testing
Use of virtual environments using Hyper-V and VMware in additon to Docker containers.
Creation of a WebSocket Server for use with the Frontend system.
Validation of group payments and integration of backend system with Frontend user interface.
Use of Amazon DynamoDB for storing group payments, groups, and users.
Creation of login & authentication for users of the merchant dashboard.
